data: {"generalSituation":"A fresh to strong northeast monsoon will reach the coast of southern China from tonight to Lunar New Year's Day. It will be cloudier with one or two rain patches over the region. It will be cool in the morning on the second and third days of Lunar New Year. The monsoon will moderate gradually in the following couple of days. Winds will be weak and it will be warm with sunny periods during the day over the coastal areas of Guangdong over the weekend.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260216","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"Light winds force 2, east force 4 at night.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. Coastal mist and one or two light rain patches in the morning and at night.
